title: FS: T206 Carl Lundgren KC- PSA 4
author: greenmonster66

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Carl Lundgren KC- PSA 4
posts.post_content:
Bought this card from fellow N54er right here. Changing direction in my collecting. Selling this very nice 1909 T206- Carl Lundgren- Kansas City card. 

Selling if for exactly what I paid for it!  $125 shipped. Pm if interested.
Friendly bump! Nice card here! Will trade for t206 horizontals graded..
